name: UNMutableNotificationContent
desc: The editable content for a notification.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The localized title, containing the reason for the alert.

items.name: var subtitle: String
items.desc: The localized subtitle, containing a secondary description of the reason for the alert.

items.name: var body: String
items.desc: The localized message to display in the notification alert.

items.name: var badge: NSNumber?
items.desc: The number to apply to the app’s icon.

items.name: var sound: UNNotificationSound?
items.desc: The sound to play when the system delivers the notification.

items.name: var launchImageName: String
items.desc: The name of the custom launch image to display when the system launches your app in response to the notification.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of custom information associated with the notification.

items.name: var attachments: [UNNotificationAttachment]
items.desc: An array of attachments to display in an alert-based notification.

items.name: var summaryArgument: String
items.desc: The string the notification adds to the category’s summary format string.

items.name: var summaryArgumentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of items the notification adds to the category’s summary format string.

items.name: var categoryIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier of the category object that represents the notification’s type.

items.name: var threadIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier that you use to group related notifications together.

items.name: var targetContentIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A value your app uses to identify the notification content.

items.name: var interruptionLevel: UNNotificationInterruptionLevel
items.desc: The interruption level determines the degree of interruption associated with the notification.

items.name: var relevanceScore: Double
items.desc: The value the system uses to sort your app’s notifications.
